channel.title: bokeh on Granular Material
channel.description: Recent content in bokeh on Granular Material

item.title: Altair vs. Bokeh (part 1)
item.description: This is the first of what I hope will be a series of posts comparing Altair and Bokeh. Both are actively supported python packages for making interactive visualizations. This post will only scratch the surface, but is intended to show the basic differences in how they approach creating visualizations.
